trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> objects that you can use to obtain information about SOAP faults in a contract.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescriptionCollection.Find%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescriptionCollection.FindAll%2A> methods to retrieve a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription> or group of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription> objects.
Returns the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> object that has the specified action value.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> object that has the specified action, or `null`.
If more than one <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> object has the same action, the first one in the collection is returned.
Returns all <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> objects that have the specified action value.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> objects that have the specified action.
If there are no <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> objects with the action, an empty collection is returned.
